translation: Knowing these paths, O Arjuna, no yogi is deluded; therefore, at all times, be steadfast in yoga.
commentary: 8.27 Not not? These these? Sriti two paths? Partha O Partha? knowing knowing? Yogi the Yogi? Muhyati is deluded? Someone anyone? Therefore therefore? in all in all? times in times? Yogic steadfast in Yoga? be (be) thou? Arjuna O Arjuna.Commentary Knowing the nature of the two paths and the conseences they lead to? a Yogi never loses his discrimination. The Yogi who knows that the path of the gods or the path
